name: Blorb enters the eye of the universe
name_original: Blorb enters the eye of the universe
description:
This is the first project that I have ever actually managed to complete. It means more to me than I myself can even comprehend, but hopefully by playing through it you might be able to. This is just part of a major new beginning for me. Here's to the Starfields, and here's to the future.

Made for the Bitsy Essay Jam:

Oh, and here's that Tom Francis article I mentioned:
